item.title: Ottawa Winters -2019
item.description: The setting It was a cold and snowy beginning to Spring here in Ottawa. We had just had one of the most intense and drawn out winters, or at least that is what it felt like to me. To confirm my suspicions, I wanted to take a look back at previous years to see how this past winter ranked. Luckily for me, there is an excellent publicly available data source for historical Canadian weather data, provided by Environment Canada.
